actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT  cust.*, 
  cbrc.countryname cbrc_countryname, 
	cbtj.countryname cbtj_countryname, 
	sv_prs.TEXT sv_prs_TEXT,
	sv_trb.TEXT sv_trb_TEXT
FROM APS_CUSTOMER cust
LEFT JOIN APS_COUNTRYMASTER cbrc ON 
cust.CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_REG_COUNTRY=cbrc.countrycode
LEFT JOIN APS_COUNTRYMASTER cbtj ON cust.CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_TAX_JD=cbtj.countrycode
LEFT JOIN APS_SELECT_VALUES sv_prs ON (cust.CUSTOMER_PARTICIPANT_TYPE=sv_prs.VALUE and sv_prs.TYPE='PARTICIPANT_ROLE_SELECTION')
LEFT JOIN APS_SELECT_VALUES sv_trb on (cust.CUSTOMER_BUSINESS_TAX_TYPE=sv_trb.VALUE and sv_trb.TYPE='TAX_REGISTRATION_BODY')
where cust.OID ='{{appsmith.store.customerOID}}';
